Recovers quickly, removes gun from Verona's hand while hanging onto helicopter skids and going up with them.
Struggles physically to prevent Verona from pushing him out of the helicopter despite severe injury, showing determination and protecting his position.
Grabs Verona by the neck in a final adrenaline rush to pull him along during a life-or-death struggle.
Climbs onto helicopter skids and wrestles his way into the back seat despite being unarmed and injured.
Holds off an opponent's stabbing attempt by catching his wrist and resisting even as his grip slips.
Continues to fight while suffering a massive coronary and physical collapse.
Almost loses physical control and falters, showing vulnerability under extreme stress.
Strangles Verona midair, expresses homicidal intent, kills him.
Calls Eve and admits to letting her down, reflects sincerely on his life and their relationship.
Strangles Verona midair while falling from a helicopter, successfully killing him despite extreme circumstances.
After killing Verona, calmly retrieves phone and leaves a thoughtful voicemail while free falling, showing presence of mind under extreme stress.
Slams off the canvas top of a moving convertible car and crashes into a news stand, getting covered with trades and fish wraps.
